data.message: Expand path cache and add exploration queue for failed paths: Added 40+ new pre-seeded paths covering football (Manchester→Nigeria, Liverpool→Africa), history (slavery→africa), culture (beatles→england), etc. Created background_path_worker.py that passively saves failed paths to failed_paths.json for later exploration. Added /explore/stats, /explore/queue, /explore/process endpoints to view and optionally process failed paths. LLM processing is manual-trigger only to control costs.
data.task: Expand path cache and add exploration queue for failed paths
data.outcome: Added 40+ new pre-seeded paths covering football (Manchester→Nigeria, Liverpool→Africa), history (slavery→africa), culture (beatles→england), etc. Created background_path_worker.py that passively saves failed paths to failed_paths.json for later exploration. Added /explore/stats, /explore/queue, /explore/process endpoints to view and optionally process failed paths. LLM processing is manual-trigger only to control costs.
